## Corporation.createCorporation() method

Create a Corporation. You should use [canCreateCorporation](./bitburner.corporation.cancreatecorporation.md) to check if you can do it before using this function, because it throws an error in some cases.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createCorporation(corporationName: string, selfFund: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  corporationName | string | Name of the corporation. It must be a non-empty string. |
|  selfFund | boolean | If you want to self-fund. Defaults to true, false will only work in BitNode 3. |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if created and false if not

## Remarks

RAM cost: 20 GB
